actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to carry out a project for water supply, Bastrop-Morehouse Parish, Louisiana.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to conduct a study for a water supply project for Bastrop-Morehouse Parish in Louisiana. Authorizes the Secretary to carry out the project if it is feasible.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to carry out a project for water supply, Bastrop-Morehouse Parish, Louisiana.
